articles.title: Fifa World Cup 2022: Argentina on brink of reaching Qatar after beating Uruguay
articles.description: Argentina are set to qualify for next year's World Cup after a 1-0 win over Uruguay on Friday.
articles.content:
Last updated on .From the section World Cup
Di Maria's sixth minute goal was enough for Argentina
Argentina are set to qualify for next year's World Cup after a 1-0 win over Uruguay.

articles.title: The two-time world champion will not play at the World Cup? “A Little Magic by Di Maria” [WIDEO] Soccer ball
articles.description: It was an extremely important meeting for Uruguay, because before this match he was only sixth, which does not give him a chance to play at the tournament in Qatar in the South American zone table in qualifying for the World Cup. articles.title: FIFA World Cup 2022 Qualifier: Angel Di Maria winner puts Argentina on brink of qualification
articles.description: Di Maria's sublime early finish at the Campeón del Siglo stadium in Montevideo was the difference between the sides in a match dominated by Uruguay.
articles.content:
Di Maria's sublime early finish at the Campeón del Siglo stadium in Montevideo was the difference between the sides in a match dominated by Uruguay.

articles.title: Soccer-Early Di Maria goal gives Argentina 1-0 win at Uruguay
articles.description: We had to be strong when the game got complicated but we were able to keep a clean sheet." The victory takes Argentina to 28 points, six behind Brazil, who on Thursday became the first South American team to guarantee their place in Qatar 2022 after beating Colombia 1-0.
articles.content:
Argentina started without Lionel Messi but a moment of magic from Angel Di Maria was enough to give them a barely deserved 1-0 win over Uruguay in Friday’s World Cup qualifier in Montevideo.

articles.title: Women in Argentina claim labor exploitation by Opus Dei
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Lucía Giménez still suffers pain in her knees from the years she spent scrubbing floors in the men’s bathroom at the Opus Dei residence in Argentina’s capital for hours without pay.
articles.content: Lucia Gimenez, from left, Alicia Torancio, and Beatriz Delgado, former Opus Dei domestic workers, pose for a photo in Buenos Aires, Argentina, Thursday, Oct. 21, 2021. The women have filed a complaint against Opus Dei to the Vatican for alleged labor... [6998 chars]

articles.title: Argentina closes in on WCup spot; Messi plays 15 minutes
articles.description: SAO PAULO (AP) — Argentina closed in on a direct World Cup spot on Friday with a 1-0 win at Uruguay, despite the absence of Lionel Messi for most of t...
articles.content:
SAO PAULO (AP) — Argentina closed in on a direct World Cup spot on Friday with a 1-0 win at Uruguay, despite the absence of Lionel Messi for most of the match as he recovers from a left knee injury.
Veteran winger Ángel di María scored the only goal ... [2208 chars]
